MS MCQs

    Work with Trade master data in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Which one of the following is not part of the typical trade master data?

      Items

      Customers

      Jobs

      Vendors


    2. What should you do if you want to find the total value of your unpaid purchases from the vendor in the current fiscal year?

      Select the Balance Due action from the Vendor Card.

      Run the Vendor – Due Dates report from the Vendor Card.

      Select a link in the Balance field on the Vendor Card and then select the Show Balance Due check box.

      Check the amount in the Balance Due field on the Vendor Card.


    3. Which of the following is not one of the three different layouts that you can use to show items in an Items List page?

      Table

      List

      Tiles

      Tall tiles


    4. To merge duplicate customer records with an existing customer, you run the Merge With action from the Customer Card. What entities can you merge with this action?

      You can merge all existing duplicated customers with the customer on a customer card.

      You can select a duplicated customer and merge it with the customer on a customer card.

      You can select a duplicated vendor and merge it with the customer on a customer card.

      You can select a duplicated customer or vendor and merge them with the customer on a customer card.
